en.container_intro: A container is a storage compartment for your data and provides a way for you to organize your data. You can think of a container as a folder in Windows® or a directory in UNIX®. The primary difference between a container and these other file system concepts is that containers cannot be nested. You can, however, create an unlimited number of containers within your account. Data must be stored in a container so you must have at least one container defined in your account prior to uploading data.
en.container_tip: A Public Container will allow anyone with the Public URL to gain access to your objects in the container.
en.delete_folder_tip: Are you sure delete folder include file?
en.name_error: At least three characters and cannot contain '/'
en.tip_add_project: Please add project with authority to use Object Storage Service.
en.tip_bucket_name: Bucket name is global, and name conflict may cause create operation failed. Name cannot starts with "." or includes "/"
en.tip_dragbox: Drag file to this area and upload
en.tip_upload_limitation: Up to 5 files each time upload, the size of each file must be within 5GB.
en.upload_tip: Delimiters ('/') are allowed in the file name to place the new file into a folder that will be created when the file is uploaded (to any depth of folders).
en.upload_suffix_tip: Upload files again to the same as the original file format.
en.warning: A Public Container will allow anyone with the Public URL to gain access to your objects in the container.

zh-CN.container_intro: 容器是储存您数据的存储室，提供便于您组织数据的方法。您可以认为容器是 Windows 中的文件夹，或者 Unix 中的目录。容器和这些文件系统的主要区别是容器无法嵌套。但是，您可以在您的账号下创建无限个容器。数据必须存储在容器里，因此您必须在上传数据前在您的帐号下定义至少一个容器。
zh-CN.container_tip: 一个公有容器会允许任何人通过公共URL 去使用你容器里面的对象。
zh-CN.delete_folder_tip: 确定删除包含文件的文件夹么？
zh-CN.name_error: 至少三个字符，且不能包含‘／’
zh-CN.tip_add_project: 请添加已开启对象存储服务的项目
zh-CN.tip_bucket_name: 存储桶名称为全局，重名会导致创建失败；名称中不能以"."开头或包含"/"
zh-CN.tip_dragbox: 将文件拖放到此处上传
zh-CN.tip_upload_limitation: 本次上传最多上传5个文件，单个文件最大为5GB。
zh-CN.upload_tip: 在文件名中允许使用分隔符（'/'）将新文件放置到文件上传时创建的文件夹中（文件夹的任意深度）。
zh-CN.upload_suffix_tip: 重新上传的文件要与原文件格式相同。
zh-CN.warning: 公共容器将允许任何具有公共URL的人访问容器中的对象。
